subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Both Syracuse’s Eric Devendorf and Gonzaga’s Josh Heytvelt carry a tinge of regret and debt of gratitude to the coaches who provided them second chances.
snippet: Both Syracuse’s Eric Devendorf and Gonzaga’s Josh Heytvelt carry a tinge of regret and debt of gratitude to the coaches who provided them second chances.
